column6: CODE RED CONSLUSION Is Red Hulk strong enough to throw down with Wolverine, Punisher, Deadpool, the all-new Red She-Hulk, and more? Find out, as new secrets are revealed as the stage is set for a Hulk event you'll have to read to believe.
